snippet: The former N.B.A. star Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel last week, is alert, and his condition is improving.
abstract: Family of former NBA star Lamar Odom says his condition is improving; Odom was found unconscious in Nevada brothel; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. star Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel last week, is alert, and his condition is improving.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Odom’s Status Is Improving
